attributes.action: Stop cruelty to animals! Close down the rscpa.!!!
attributes.additional_details:
Bring an end to the thousands of needless executions of defenceless animals, carried out annually by the rspca.
Petition this government to remove the powers (self granted and indulgent), from this charity (sic) that has taken on the role of  the CPS, the judiciary and, ultimately, the executioner.
